GetSearchItem Namespace Reference

The functions for retreiving SearchMatches from SearchModule if you only have the ID of the match. More...

Detailed Description

The functions for retreiving SearchMatches from SearchModule if you only have the ID of the match.

) 
 

Get the SearchMatch from the SearchModule for the SearchMatch.

Parameters:
requester The thing that can send Requests.
inputMatch The item to get the search match for.
language The language requested.
result Set to the result, set if function returns true.
Returns:
True if item was gotten ok.
